resources.string: you have to pass a card

Row Seven poker is a solitaire game, 
 first player start with spade 7, and other player will follow with 8, or 6 and so on 
 7 in every suit is always available 
 you can pass some card once you cannot contiue, thus can make you lose some point 
 a proper passed card will make another players lose more point too 
 lose point measured from 1 to 13, make sure you lose less than others! 
 enjoy it!
this is a game based on libGDX, written by Ke Yang \n(jakke.yang@gmail.com) you can also find source code in github
